name: Elena Petrova
routine: Elena sleeps at 10pm and wakes up at 6am to prepare her children for school before heading to work.
occupation: Elena is a high school teacher, teaching history in St. Petersburg. Her school day starts at 8 am and ends at 3 pm.
thoughts: Elena recently has been concerned about her son's performance in school and is considering getting him a tutor. She plans to discuss this with her husband over the weekend.
lifestyle: Elena follows a typical Russian cuisine, enjoys classical music to unwind, and spends her weekends at the local park with her family. She prefers reading historical novels in her spare time.
